/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from an elevated position, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is a vibrant display of urban life, lined with a variety of buildings and shops. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
